q: Fox News' Sean Hannity , Donald Rumsfeld also said the extremist, autocratic rule in Iran is an example of what could happen in Egypt, and other Middle Eastern nations, experiencing signs of political upheaval. If you think of the Iran model, where there was a popular revolution, and it wasn't the populace that ended up in charge- it was a very small, radical, extremist clique- that risk exists[ in other Middle East countries], said Donald Rumsfeld , whose memoir, "Known and Unknown," was published Tuesday. Commissioner Roger Goodell said today he has spoken to Michael Vick three times in the past two weeks and that the Eagles quarterback had "no intention" of attending the Super Bowl parties being promoted under his name. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name, Roger Goodell said, clearly implying that it was done without Michael Vick 's permission. Grizzlies in Anthony Morrow 's return Allen Iverson raced downcourt and floated an alley-oop lob that Carmelo Anthony shoved one-handed through the hoop for an arena-rattling jam, one that seemed to holler to all their doubters, "Take that!" We just wanted to show the whole world we could play together, Anthony Morrow said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night. "We know there's a lot of doubt about that."
